mapper.select: SELECT device_type.*, cs_major.major_name majorName, cs_subsystem.system_name systemName FROM device_type device_type LEFT JOIN cs_major cs_major ON cs_major.major_code = device_type.major_code LEFT JOIN cs_subsystem cs_subsystem ON cs_subsystem.system_code = device_type.system_code WHERE device_type.del_flag =0 group by device_type.code
select id,major_name,major_code from cs_major where major_name = #{majorCodeName} and del_flag =0
select system_code from cs_subsystem where del_flag =0 and system_name = #{systemName} and major_code = #{code}
